Changelog
---------

Here you can see the full list of changes between each SQLAlchemy-Defaults release.


0.1.3 (26.1.2013)
^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^

- Fixed empty column args handling (again)


0.1.2 (26.1.2013)
^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^

- Fixed empty column args handling


0.1.1 (26.1.2013)
^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^

- Added custom Column class


0.1.0 (24.1.2013)
^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^

- Initial public release
